content:
Hi @Steven Borg, in your DICOM on FHIR talk (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fXCPPTocCgg) you offer to explain in the Q&A how the situation would change in R5, but no one took you up on that. Could I still ask you for that? :smile:
Is that the introduction of the ImagingSelection resource? That you can reference to a ImagingSelection instead of ImagingStudy from an Observation/DiagnosticReport?

ImagingSelection looks like a DICOM KOS object, and yes, that would be a great addition to what one could do with an ImagingStudy. ImagingSelection will also have a role to play in the FHIR version of XDS-I.
Imaging selection is significantly more that a DICOM KOS though -- it lets you tie specific image regions with findings, and more.
